name: Raspberry Trifle

ingredients.name: fresh or frozen unsweetened raspberries, thawed and drained

steps: In a heavy 2-qt saucepan, combine the cornstarch adn sugar; gradullay stir in milk.
Bring to a boil over medium heat; stirring constantly.
Gradually stir 1/2 cup into egg yolks; return all to pan an mix well.
Cook and stir over medium-low hear for 15 minutes or until mixture thickens slightly and coats the back of a spoon (do not boil).
Pour into a bowl and cover with waxed paper.
Meanwhile, cut cake into 3/4-in. slices; spread with jam.
Cut each slice into thirds; place with jam side up in a 3-qt. trifle dish or a deap salad bowl.
Just before serving, whip cream and sugar until stiff; spread over custard.
Garnish with almonds and berries if desired.
